price: 64. Bagi mereka berita gembira di dalam kehidupan di dunia dan di akhirat. Tidak ada perubahan bagi janji-janji Allah. Demikian itulah kemenangan yang agung.
arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahumu al-bush'rā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati lā tabdīla likalimāti al-lahi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
